-1.title: Snack Odyssey
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Ice Ice BLT
1.plot: At the Sacramento State Fair, multiple crews work their buns off to save a chef's bacon. Meanwhile, things heat up as artisan sculptors wield their pickaxes to create a show-stopping ice bar.

2.title: The Mother Lode
2.plot: A Toronto bakery prepares a mammoth order for one of the world's most prestigious hotels. Meanwhile, the overnight juicing team scrambles as a costly mistake puts them behind schedule.

3.title: Baby Cakes
3.plot: An over-spiced kettle of soup has a Toronto culinary team heading back to the cutting board with just two hours to spare. Meanwhile, the crew at a New York bakery finds itself short on ingredients and at risk of missing the boat.

4.title: Hole in One
4.plot: A squad of Ohio taco artists is determined to win an annual food truck competition. Meanwhile, a Toronto team struggles to create an exotic custom dessert for a prestigious client.

imdb.plot outline: Food Factory: Night Shift follows the unsung culinary heroes who work all night to chop, baste, and bake palette pleasing eats and some far-out custom orders. From the prep work to delivery to the successful reveal, it's all in a night's work for these invisible kitchen superstars. It's a high-stakes gamble as a Nevada bakery conjures up Elvis-style wedding cakes for a legendary Vegas chapel. Things heat up as artisan sculptors wield their pickaxes to create a show-stopping ice bar. And it's down to the wire as a family-run bakery prepares a mammoth last-minute bagel order for one of the world's most prestigious hotels.
imdb.title: Food Factory: Night Shift
plot: _Food Factory: Night Shift_ (qv) follows the unsung culinary heroes who work all night to chop, baste, and bake palette pleasing eats and some far-out custom orders.

From the prep work to delivery to the successful reveal, it's all in a night's work for these invisible kitchen superstars. It's a high-stakes gamble as a Nevada bakery conjures up Elvis-style wedding cakes for a legendary Vegas chapel. Things heat up as artisan sculptors wield their pickaxes to create a show-stopping ice bar.
